TopicTitle: Using Enhanced Interface, and having some issues with backspace.

Articles.Content:
For some reason, when switching to bold, italics, etc. hitting the backspace key will bring me back to the end of whatever was formatted.

So for example if I **bold this** make a mistake, and hit backspace, it will take me back to the 's' in this or the space after it, and delete it.

> 
> For some reason, when switching to bold, italics, etc. hitting the backspace key will bring me back to the end of whatever was formatted.
> So for example if I **bold this** make a mistake, and hit backspace, it will take me back to the 's' in this or the space after it, and delete it.

This is a known bug with using the WYSIWYG mode. (What You See Is What You Get) Its the button at the top right of the editor buttons. looks like A/A

Click it so that it's highlighted in blue. This will change it to use BB code, such as [noparse]**bold**[/noparse] for bold letters. (I used noparse to show you the BB code)

Nearest guess is it's just an annoying bug in the editor as a result of some sloppy code somewhere. There's not much we can do about it, sadly. If it irritates you too much, you can change the editor the forum displays for you, so that you always see the BBCodes rather than the formatting in the editor.
Alright, thanks for the explanation. I'll just use the BB code mode.
